title: Muscle Cuffs and Marginal Gains: The Bizzare World of ‘Blood Flow Restriction Training’
content:
The peloton is using BFR for rehab, recovery, and to augment training. But in many cases, the implementation of this curious performance hack doesn't stack up to the science.

Read the full article at Muscle Cuffs and Marginal Gains: The Bizzare World of ‘Blood Flow Restriction Training’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
